Class Platno

  • java.lang.Object
    • Platno
  • public class Platno
extends java.lang.Object
    Canvas is a class to allow for simple graphical drawing on a canvas. This is a modification of the general purpose Canvas, specially made for the BlueJ "shapes" example.
    Version:
    2.0 (7 November 2022)
